title: 2 Step Verification / Mobile Authenticator please?
body:
Is there any plans to implement additional security features - specifically a 2 step verification or mobile authenticator app? I have one for all of the other major platforms I use - Steam, Battle.net, Gmail, Facebook etc. so why isn't there one for League too? I (and I'm sure many others) value their League account as much as their precious Steam and Blizzard accounts; League falls into that category too, yet has no mobile authenticator app or at least 2 step SMS code verification. League is a popular platform with a huge player base and we deserve to have additional security options for our accounts.

c'mon rito {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
Currently 2FA is only enabled for when account information is being changed. You can read more about it here:

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/important-security-update-and-password-reset

If you'd like to ask Riot about where they stand on 2FA for logins, send em an Ask Riot message!

https://ask.leagueoflegends.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
